document.full_text: suicide bombers attacked a pakistani paramilitary academy on friday, killing 80 people in revenge for the death of osama bin laden as pakistani anger over the u.s. raid to get the al qaeda leader showed no sign of cooling.
document.title: bombers take bin laden revenge in pakistan; u.s. ties cool
lines_and_colors: suicide bombers attacked a pakistani paramilitary academy on friday, killing 80 people in revenge for the death of osama bin laden as pakistani anger over the u.s. raid to get the al qaeda leader showed no sign of cooling.
